name: Medieval Delivery
description:
We all know that delivery is a fundamental part of modern times. But why not imagine what it would have been like to carry out this activity in a medieval era?

The World

Medieval Delivery is a simulation and adventure game. Embark on an exciting journey through a medieval world steeped in mystery and intrigue. Set in the bustling town of Thornridge, players assume the role of Alistair, a humble courier with a hidden past. As Alistair navigates picturesque landscapes and interacts with the town's diverse inhabitants, he uncovers a web of secrets that threaten Thornridge's tranquility.

Thorough Exploration

The expansive town of Thornridge and its surroundings hide secrets, treasures, and alternative routes that players can discover in multiple playthroughs. Delving into side character stories and parallel missions enriches the experience, encouraging players to delve deeper into the game world.

Variety of Missions

At times, you'll simply need to deliver what's requested, while in others, you'll have to first fetch the item from another location, make the delivery at a specific time of day, or within a time limit.

Home

You can spend the coins you earn from your deliveries to buy items to decorate your house. With each delivery, tasks will start to appear that need to be done during certain hours of the day. In your home, you can fast forward time or decide to make other deliveries if you wish, while you wait for night to fall.
